title: skins gone after update
body: so what I'm hearing is NO ONE else lost all their skins the moment they downloaded and installed the new client? if I don't get my skins back I'm not playing this game anymore

replies.body: I'm with Lew on this, as it sounds like you might be logging onto another account or even region.  Let me know if that's the case.
Yeah, I lost my skins as well.  The only one I remember specifically is the Ionia master yi with the chromas, which I now have none of
Are you logging in with the right region/account information?
